name: Melanie Stineford
text: We ordered the 3 topping medium pizza special which was suppose to include bread sticks and a 2 liter pop. We only got the pizza and pop.  I called and spoke with the manager. The manager refused to make my order right by delivering the …More

name: B J
text: Typical pizza hut, good, cheap, and quick. Nice staff and clean environment

name: LoveLe R.
text: Monica is amazing at getting my order right for my kids.

name: Josh Mordecai
text: I ordered a bunch of pizzas for my staff, but I made an error on my online order. They quickly took care of it and gave me a discount, even though it was my fault! They then gave me the extra pizzas for free. They were super friendly and professional too, as they always are. They earned a big tip as well as my loyalty!

name: L Scoresby
text: We had the buffet. Pizza was good and fresh. The lettuce in the buffet didn't look very good but the other veggies were fresh. The server was friendly and did a good job making sure we had what we needed and keeping our drinks filled.  Overall, it was a positive experience and I'd eat here again.

name: Robert Emmons
text: This was my first visit at this location. My wife and I had met there for lunch. We had the pizza and salad bar. It was poorly stocked and not well kept. We had a choice of two half pizzas, two empty pizza platters, an empty tray of pasta …More

name: Ashley Farnsworth
text: I just had a great customer service experience today, so I thought I'd share! Jessica, in Roosevelt, took my order today after I was unable to order online like I usually do. She was extremely sweet, offered lots of deals that saved me a ton and did this while her system was down. 💕💕

name: Tylor Burr
text: The staff was friendly but they didn't have any fresh vegetables. So my pizza was a little empty in the toppings.

name: Marianne Rogers
text: Service SUCKED!!! We were the only people in there and about 25 minutes later Jesse came over and said it will be just a few minutes I didn’t put your order in right!! All we ordered was a meat lovers, nothing hard about that... right. Then …More

text: Had to seat myself get my own silverware buffet wasn't that fresh they did bring a fresh pizza out after 20 minutes

name: Rose Adelbush

name: Leslie Winterton
text: EVERY time we have come here whether it’s take out or dine in, our order has been messed up. They advertise specials and then don’t honor them, etc. don’t waste your time or money and go somewhere else!

name: Lisa Peel
text: The whole place was clean, staff was friendly, and the pizza was amazing! I haven't had that great of a pizza hut pizza since I was little. Highly recommend coming here for pizza!

name: Katt Killian
text: Friendly service, great wings. Took some time to get our food but to be fair there was a part going on.

name: Nicholas Ogden
text: I have a VHS tape my parents made a few days before I was born where my dad raves about Pizza Hut and their Italian pizza pies. He says he hoped Pizza Hut is around for me to try when I'm old enough. The video is really corny and for that reason Pizza Hut will always hold a special place in my heart.

text: Salad bar was frozen. My food didn't come out properly the first time, never got the garlic knots we ordered either til my entire family was done eating, then they brought my food out. Needless to say I will not be going back there.

I enjoy pizza hut, but this time I was really disappointed.
